title: System Debug Software Engineer
description: As a System Debug Software Engineer, I specialized in troubleshooting and optimizing complex software systems. I worked with technologies such as Python, Linux, Docker, and Jenkins to automate processes, develop testing frameworks, and improve system performance.

title: Software Engineer
description: As a Software Engineer, I worked on the development and validation of automotive Body Control Modules (BCM). My responsibilities included writing efficient C++ code for embedded systems, utilizing Linux for development and testing environments. I used Git for version control and Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment.

title: Functional Validation Intern
description: As a Functional Validation Intern, I focused on validating System on a Chip (SoC) designs to ensure their functionality and performance. I used Python for scripting and automation, Linux for the development environment, and Git for version control. Additionally, I worked with C++ to develop drivers.
